title: Wind Farm Feasibility Study
description: A study to assess the viability of establishing a wind farm in the Northern Cape, considering environmental and economic factors, with potential for community ownership and job creation.
purpose: To generate renewable energy, contribute to climate change mitigation goals, and promote local economic development.

additionalClassifications.description: Increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

budgetBreakdowns.description: Budget allocated for environmental impact assessments
Budget for community consultations and engagement activities

climateMeasures.description: Wind energy generation as a clean energy source.

benefits.title: Renewable Energy Generation
benefits.description: The wind farm will contribute to South Africa's renewable energy goals and reduce dependence on fossil fuels.

beneficiaries.description: Local communities through potential reduced electricity costs

benefits.title: Local Economic Development
benefits.description: The project has the potential to create job opportunities and stimulate economic growth in the region.

policies: Renewable Energy Independent Power Producer Procurement Programme

climateFinance.parisAgreement: Aligned with the goals of the Paris Agreement

title: Wind Farm Construction Project
description: Construction of a wind farm in the Northern Cape, following feasibility studies and preparation, with a focus on environmental protection, community engagement, and job creation.
purpose: To generate renewable energy, contribute to climate change mitigation goals, and promote local economic development.

title: Northern Cape Wind Farm
description: A completed wind farm project in the Northern Cape, providing renewable energy to the national grid and contributing to local economic development.
purpose: To generate renewable energy, contribute to climate change mitigation goals, and promote local economic development.

additionalClassifications.description: Increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix

budgetBreakdowns.description: Budget for construction materials and labor
Budget for wind turbines and electrical equipment
Budget for project management and oversight

summary.title: Wind Turbine Supply and Installation Contract
summary.description: Contract for the supply and installation of wind turbines for the wind farm.

summary.title: Wind Farm Construction Contract
summary.description: Contract for the construction of infrastructure and facilities for the wind farm.

completion.endDateDetails: Wind farm construction completed and fully operational.
completion.finalValueDetails: Project completed slightly over budget due to unexpected costs during turbine installation.
completion.finalScope: Construction of a 20-turbine wind farm with a total capacity of 50 MW.
completion.finalScopeDetails: The project scope was achieved as planned.

maintenancePlan.description: Regular inspection and maintenance of wind turbines, electrical systems, and infrastructure.

Repair of any equipment malfunctions or damage.
